nodes.bodyText:
I think it should be enough to just use:

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            android:layout_height="0dp"
          
          
            
                            android:layout_weight="1"
          
          
            
                            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
          
      
    
    
  

and then use android:layout_weight in the children (like you already do). You can use 1 for each child - no need to end up with a total of 1.
Could you please indent those with more spaces, so that the file uses consistent indention? I know it's different in different files but we should at least try to keep one scheme per file.
I've indented it with 8 spaces now.
Please use tools:text here to make it clear that it is only used for the layout preview and that the actual text is set using Java.
